alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:18PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fond du Lac and east central Green Lake Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Lake, or 8 miles southwest of Ripon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripon, Rosendale, Green Lake, Brandon, Eldorado, Fairwater, and West Rosendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
